name: CRUMB (itch) (Simon da Silva)
description:
Congratulations kamrat. You have been admitted to the Gemini Station’s Camaraderie Program.

Whatever crimes you may have committed do not matter here, this is your chance to prove your loyalty to the state. Work together with your fellow inmate to mine resources for the good of your people.

DO NOT LEAVE THE PREMISES . . .

-------------------------------------------------

CRUMB is a cooperative game with a style inspired by old soviet space race posters where 2 players have to work together to commandeer the same space ship. Mine resources and use them to escape your imprisonment at the Gemini Station. 

IMPORTANT - CRUMB is only designed with local co-op in mind and as such two controllers are required to play!

This is a student project created as a collaborative effort between graphics students and programming students.
